thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Simon Middleditch
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Simon Middleditch

author: Simon Middleditch
title: Simon Middleditch
text: I purchased a Suunto Traverse Sapphire Black for $250 cheaper than from a dealer in Perth. Very happy with the product, and the quick easy service at eglobal. Communication with eglobal for any questions you may have regarding your product are quickly responded to. I can highly recommend eglobal.
